Pre-Game Insights: Kurt Okraku expressed frustration over Black Stars' recent underwhelming performances ahead of their crucial doubleheader against Sudan this month.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ghana's 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifying hopes hang by a thread, with the team sitting third in Group F.
Others: The Black Stars are set to face Sudan at the Accra Sports Stadium on October 10 before heading to Libya for the return fixture on October 15.
